description: Send outbound email for outbound campaigns. For more information about outbound campaigns, see Set up Amazon Connect outbound campaigns.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: FromEmailAddress
parameters.description: The email address to be used for sending email. The email address with the instance, in [^s@]+@[^s@]+.[^s@]+ format. DisplayName (string) --- The display name of email address.

nested_params.name: EmailAddress
nested_params.description: The email address with the instance, in [^s@]+@[^s@]+.[^s@]+ format.

nested_params.name: DisplayName
nested_params.description: The display name of email address.

parameters.name: DestinationEmailAddress
parameters.description: The email address to send the email to. The email address with the instance, in [^s@]+@[^s@]+.[^s@]+ format. DisplayName (string) --- The display name of email address.

nested_params.name: EmailAddress
nested_params.description: The email address with the instance, in [^s@]+@[^s@]+.[^s@]+ format.

nested_params.name: DisplayName
nested_params.description: The display name of email address.

parameters.name: AdditionalRecipients
parameters.description: The additional recipients address of the email in CC. CcEmailAddresses (list) --- The additional CC email address recipients information. (dict) --- Contains information about a source or destination email address The email address with the instance, in [^s@]+@[^s@]+.[^s@]+ format. DisplayName (string) --- The display name of email address.

nested_params.name: CcEmailAddresses
nested_params.description: The additional CC email address recipients information.

nested_params.name: EmailAddress
nested_params.description: The email address with the instance, in [^s@]+@[^s@]+.[^s@]+ format.

nested_params.name: DisplayName
nested_params.description: The display name of email address.

parameters.name: EmailMessage
parameters.description: The email message body to be sent to the newly created email. The message source type, that is, RAW or TEMPLATE. TemplatedMessageConfig (dict) --- Information about template message configuration. The identifier of the knowledge base. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN. The identifier of the message template Id. Information about template attributes, that is, CustomAttributes or CustomerProfileAttributes. CustomAttributes (dict) --- An object that specifies the custom attributes values to use for variables in the message template. This object contains different categories of key-value pairs. Each key defines a variable or placeholder in the message template. (string) --- (string) --- CustomerProfileAttributes (string) --- An object that specifies the customer profile attributes values to use for variables in the message template. RawMessage (dict) --- The raw email body content. The email subject. The email message body. Type of content, that is, text/plain or text/html.

nested_params.name: MessageSourceType
nested_params.description: The message source type, that is, RAW or TEMPLATE.

nested_params.name: TemplatedMessageConfig
nested_params.description: Information about template message configuration.

nested_params.name: KnowledgeBaseId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the knowledge base. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

nested_params.name: MessageTemplateId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the message template Id.

nested_params.name: TemplateAttributes
nested_params.description: Information about template attributes, that is, CustomAttributes or CustomerProfileAttributes.

nested_params.name: CustomAttributes
nested_params.description: An object that specifies the custom attributes values to use for variables in the message template. This object contains different categories of key-value pairs. Each key defines a variable or placeholder in the message template.

nested_params.name: CustomerProfileAttributes
nested_params.description: An object that specifies the customer profile attributes values to use for variables in the message template. This object contains different categories of key-value pairs. Each key defines a variable or placeholder in the message template.

nested_params.name: RawMessage
nested_params.description: The raw email body content.

nested_params.name: Subject
nested_params.description: The email subject.

nested_params.name: Body
nested_params.description: The email message body.

nested_params.name: ContentType
nested_params.description: Type of content, that is, text/plain or text/html.

parameters.name: SourceCampaign
parameters.description: A Campaign object need for Campaign traffic type. CampaignId (string) --- A unique identifier for a campaign. OutboundRequestId (string) --- A unique identifier for a each request part of same campaign.

nested_params.name: CampaignId
nested_params.description: A unique identifier for a campaign.

nested_params.name: OutboundRequestId
nested_params.description: A unique identifier for a each request part of same campaign.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If not provided, the Amazon Web Services SDK populates this field. For more information about idempotency, see Making retries safe with idempotent APIs. This field is autopopulated if not provided.
